vulnerability_findings.name: use-ownable2step
vulnerability_findings.message: By demanding that the receiver of the owner permissions actively accept via a contract call of its own,  `Ownable2Step` and `Ownable2StepUpgradeable` prevent the contract ownership from accidentally being transferred  to an address that cannot handle it.

vulnerability_findings.name: non-payable-constructor
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider making costructor payable to save gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function ownerLives() internal view returns (bool) {

    return timeOfDeath_ == 0;
vulnerability_findings.message:
Heritable.ownerLives (Heritable.sol#188-190) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- timeOfDeath_ == 0

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
Heritable.claimHeirOwnership (Heritable.sol#171-179) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= timeOfDeath_ + heartbeatTimeout_) (Heritable.sol#174)

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function ownerLives() internal view returns (bool) {

    return timeOfDeath_ == 0;
vulnerability_findings.message:
Heritable.ownerLives (Heritable.sol#188-190) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- timeOfDeath_ == 0 (Heritable.sol#189)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function

vulnerability_findings.message: Heritable.heir (Heritable.sol#129-131) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
